Object Shape: Diamond, Disc, Flash, Sphere, Star-like, Triangle
divs: Sighting DetailsI just went outside and noticed object in the sky. I went and got my family to come outside and look. I went and got my phone with no minutes but the camera still works. I was able to get 3 pictures- I will buy minutes soon and send the pictures to you guys. These are the first pictures I have ever taken before. I talked my son into also taking pictures and attempt to put them with his report. My family cannot stand me even taking an interest in this matter. The fact is I am the victim of Alien Abduction. I was taken back in Sept-2006 en-route to work for US Customs and Border Patrol in Montana. No-one would believe me!! I take care of myself and make reports with you guys when I sight something. This is major tonight. I have noticed something that looked the same following me for the last 2 weeks. I know when these beings are in the area!! They are here. I am not afraid- Im thinking they are just doing the usual and just keeping track of where Im at. I dont think they are going to come down. These beings can beam down from the sky- but hopefully they want. The issue that bothers me a little is the Red solid something I saw beside of the really bright starlike object. The starlike is not a star- it may be a satelite- I will check the internet when possible- could be a planet? Jet flew by- in the area
Summary: I went outside and just noticed - My son and I got pictures- he attempted to send them, and also may have created a report. My family gets upset with me every time I even talk about UFO or what has happen to me. I do not understand why?
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Shelby
There were no other sightings in Shelby on or around November 28th 2013
